'''Story Domains''' are unique [[One-Time Domains|One-Time]] [[Domains]] that can only be accessed as part of an [[Archon Quest|Archon]], [[Story Quest|Story]], or [[World Quest]]s. Once complete they can no longer be visited, hence, one should check for hidden chests thoroughly.
